overview: Law-abiding citizen Benny Hines is so by-the-book that he won't even cross the street until the sign says "Walk." But when his best friend gets into $20,000 worth of trouble with a heartless loan shark, Benny does the unthinkable and commits a string of high-stakes felonies. Sacrificing his morals for the sake of a pal, however, may cost Benny more than he ever imagined.
title: Queens Over Jacks
